ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero: Saturday Morning Adventures
ComicInfo.Summary: G.I. Joe is the code name for America's daring, highly trained, special mission force. Its purpose: to defend human freedom against Cobra, a ruthless terrorist organization determined to rule the world... well, you know the story! But now, Cobra might have found their most versatile weapon yet! Can even G.I. Joe stop the Aladdin Initiative? Find out in this special Saturday-morning send-up, based on the classic 1980s cartoon and brought to you by the superstar creative team of Erik Burnham, Dan Schoening, and Luis Antonio Delgado (Ghostbusters, Godzilla: Monsters & Protectors)!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 20:20:20. [CVDB907735]
ComicInfo.Characters: Ace, Baroness, Bazooka, Buzzer, Cobra Commander, Destro, Duke, Gung-Ho, Mainframe, Roadblock, Scarlett, Sci-Fi, Torch, Zartan
